text: Giuliana Rancic is set to return as the co - host of “ E! News, ” the cable network announced Friday. “ Giuliana is an incredibly charismatic and well - respected entertainment journalist. As a longtime member of the E! family, it ’ s exciting to welcome her back home to ‘ E! News, ’ ” said John Najarian, executive vice president and general manager of news and digital for E!. “ While ‘ E! News ’ has seen massive growth across digital and social, we have also continued to expand and elevate our television coverage, and Giuliana is an excellent addition to our weeknight series, which remains the most watched entertainment news franchise with young women. ” Rancic was previously the co - host of the nigtly entertainment news
